wordpressPage.title: The Jelly Straw Race
wordpressPage.content:
This game started out as an upfront game but could be used as an ice breaker if you’re prepared to buy/make lots of jelly!

All you need is some pots of jelly (the Hartley’s ones available from supermarkets are idea) and some straws.

Get your participants to have a pot of jelly and a straw. On ‘Go’ they have 3 minutes to ‘drink’ as much of their jelly through the straw as possible. If they finish their jelly the pot must be place, upside-down on their heads!

You could also use this as an upfront game at your youth event
